snippet: Avoiding the crashes and chaos unfolding behind him at the Belgian Grand Prix on Sunday, Jenson Button led from start to finish for his first Formula One victory at Spa.
abstract: Avoiding the crashes and chaos unfolding behind him at the Belgian Grand Prix on Sunday, Jenson Button led from start to finish for his first Formula One victory at Spa.

headline.main: Avoiding Chaos in His Wake, Button Wins at Spa
